content.question: Land parcels in the American Midwest tend to be rectilinear because

choices.label: the federal survey system adopted in the late eighteenth century imposed a geometric pattern on the landscape
Native American settlement patterns were rectangular
English-speaking settlers replicated the landscape patterns of England
Spanish colonists laid out settlements in a rigid geometric pattern
there were no mountains or rivers to use as boundaries

content.answer: the federal survey system adopted in the late eighteenth century imposed a geometric pattern on the landscape

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
